title: Manufacturing Data Platform
description: Developed a centralized enterprise data warehouse using SSIS/SSAS ETL pipelines to integrate multiple source application databases into a unified tabular model with optimized Dimension and Fact tables for high-performance Power BI analytics and reporting.
points: Consolidated disparate data sources into a single trusted data repository, improving data consistency and eliminating reporting silos.
Accelerated analytics and decision-making through optimized Dim/Fact structures and a performant SSAS tabular model powering Power BI dashboards.
Reduced manual reporting effort by enabling automated data refreshes, standardized KPIs, and self-service analytics for business stakeholders.

title: WMS & Shipping Data Integration
description: Integrated FedEx Ship Manager Server with Manhattan SCALE WMS to automate label generation, rate service calls, and shipment execution, ensuring seamless carrier connectivity and accurate outbound logistics processing.
points: Reduced operational time and labor by automating shipping steps and eliminating manual label entry.
Improved shipment accuracy and tracking through direct data synchronization between WMS orders and FedEx carrier services.
Enhanced throughput and scalability in outbound logistics, supporting higher order volumes with lower error rates.

title: Custom C# Tools for Plant Operations
description: Developed a custom C# application for plant operations enabling centralized management of user profiles across multiple databases with role-based access and streamlined administration.
points: Increased administrative efficiency by allowing centralized updates rather than maintaining users separately within each database.
Improved security and compliance through consistent access control and standardized permission enforcement across all systems.
Reduced downtime and support overhead by simplifying user provisioning, credential updates, and role changes with a faster, unified process.
